description:
A travelling doctor known as Kada of the Way of the Five Grains! He is on a quest searching for the Crucial Keys to the Way of Peace, purportedly to keep them out of the hands of people who would abuse its abilities, or become tools of the magical book itself.
He does not mind offering medical aid to those in need, and is rather enthusiastic about it, yelling like a super robot hero and performing cool-looking poses all the while.
name: Kada Genka
